Exterior Waterproofing Toronto

Expert Exterior Waterproofing Toronto - Stop Water Before It Reaches Your Walls

Professional exterior foundation waterproofing in Toronto & GTA. Full excavation, waterproof membranes, drainage systems from outside. Permanent protection with lifetime warranty. Call: (437) 545-0067

Licensed & Insured

25+ Years Experience

Same Day Service

Lifetime Warranty

The Gold Standard in Foundation Protection

Complete exterior waterproofing systems that stop water before it reaches your walls

Exterior waterproofing represents the ultimate in basement protection. By creating a complete waterproof barrier around your foundation from the outside, these systems prevent water infiltration while preserving your foundation's structural integrity for generations.

Why Choose Exterior Waterproofing?

Complete protection that addresses the root cause of water problems

Complete Protection

Stops water before it enters your foundation walls

Foundation Preservation

No Interior Moisture

Addresses Root Cause

Treats the problem at its source, not just symptoms

Maximum ROI

Lifetime Solution

When Exterior Waterproofing is Essential

Situations where exterior systems are the optimal choice

Severe Water Problems

When interior systems can't handle the water volume

Foundation Deterioration

Visible spalling, cracking, or structural damage

High Water Table

Constant hydrostatic pressure against foundation

Valuable Finished Basement

Protecting significant investment in basement renovation

New Construction

Installing during construction or major renovations

Complete Peace of Mind

Maximum protection for ultimate confidence

Professional Assessment

Not sure if exterior waterproofing is right for your situation? Our certified technicians provide free, comprehensive assessments to recommend the optimal solution for your specific needs and budget.

Premium Waterproof Membrane Systems

We select the optimal membrane type for your specific conditions

Rubberized Asphalt

Self-adhering sheets with 60-mil thickness for superior protection

Liquid Membrane

Spray or roll application creating seamless waterproof barrier

Bentonite Clay

Natural waterproofing with self-healing properties

Modified Bitumen

Hot-applied systems for extreme durability

Membrane Selection Factors:

Technical Considerations:
  • â€¢ Foundation material and condition
  • â€¢ Soil type and drainage characteristics
  • â€¢ Water table level and pressure
  • â€¢ Climate and freeze-thaw cycles
Project Requirements:
  • â€¢ Budget and timeline constraints
  • â€¢ Access limitations and site conditions
  • â€¢ Integration with existing systems
  • â€¢ Long-term maintenance preferences

Understanding Your Investment

Exterior waterproofing costs and long-term value

Exterior waterproofing represents a significant investment that provides exceptional long-term value. While initial costs are higher than interior solutions, the comprehensive protection and foundation preservation make it the preferred choice for serious water problems.

Typical Investment Range

Single wall (30 ft) $9,000-$15,000
Partial house (60 ft) $18,000-$30,000
Full house (120 ft) $36,000-$60,000

Return on Investment

Home value increase +10-15%
Damage prevention $20,000+
Insurance premium reduction 5-15%

Financing Available

We offer flexible financing options including 0% interest for qualified homeowners, extended payment terms, and assistance with insurance claims to make exterior waterproofing affordable.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is exterior waterproofing worth the higher cost?

For homes with serious water issues, exterior waterproofing is always worth it. It adds 10-15% to home value, prevents tens of thousands in water damage, and provides lifetime protection. The investment typically pays for itself within 5-7 years.

How disruptive is the excavation process?

While excavation is necessary, we minimize disruption through careful planning, efficient work practices, and protective measures. Most clients are surprised at how organized and clean the process is. We document and restore all landscaping.

Can exterior waterproofing be done in winter?

Limited winter work is possible with heated enclosures and specialized techniques, but spring through fall are optimal for exterior waterproofing. We can provide temporary protection and schedule full installation for ideal weather conditions.

What warranty comes with exterior waterproofing?

We provide comprehensive lifetime warranties on workmanship and long-term warranties on materials. Our exterior waterproofing warranties are transferable to future homeowners, adding value when you sell.
